title: pgeuder:下载试玩版国家TOP3
author: 独孤粽
txt_content: And the top 3 Minecraft Demo Downloading countries are... US, BR, JP in the order of volume. Hope you enjoy! And also: buy the game!  下载Minecraft试玩版次数最多的国家是....美国，巴西和日本（按数量排名），玩得开心！别忘了:购买正版哟!
